question: Who was the first British Prime Minister born in the 20th Century. Also the only PM to have played 1st class cricket?
api_result: The first British Prime Minister born in the 20th century who also played first-class cricket was Sir Alec Douglas-Home. Born on July 2, 1903, Douglas-Home served as the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from October 1963 to October 1964. Before his political career, he played first-class cricket, representing Middlesex and Oxford University, among other teams.
